findings.title: Typo in receiver
findings.description: The two functions `_mintAPMorgan()` as well as `_mintCrossChain()` have a typo with the word `”receiver”` being `”reciever”`.

findings.title: Use underscores in number literals
findings.description: Using underscores in number literals increases readability.

findings.title: Not enforcing index order in initializer
findings.description: The `initialize()` function receives a `startIndex` and `endIndex` argument but does not verify them, which could lead to issues if `endIndex` is less than `startIndex`.

findings.title: Unused index
findings.description: The startIndex variable, which defines the first tokenId of minted NFTs, is not used beyond the initialize() function.
